titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for an increase in the maximum amount of veterans' mortgage life insurance available under laws administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs.

bill.summary: Increases the maximum loan guarantee amount under the veterans' mortgage life insurance program from $90,000 to $200,000.
